&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; &EnvironmentTaxDeclare; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000)
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_ban_nt, a.gia_nt2, a.ck_nt, rtrim(b.tk_dt) as tk_dt, 0 as kieu_dt, rtrim(b.tk_ck) as tk_ck, 0 as kieu_ck, rtrim(b.tk_dt) as tk_vt, rtrim(b.tk_gv) as tk_gv, 0 as kieu_gv, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, a.so_luong as ton13, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, a.ngay_ct, rtrim(a.stt_rec_dh) as stt_rec_dh, rtrim(a.stt_rec0dh) as stt_rec0dh, rtrim(a.dh_so) as dh_so, a.dh_ln &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; &DetailTaxFieldsBaseRef; &EnvironmentTaxFields; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d66$000000 a cross join dmvt b&DetailTaxJoin; &EnvironmentTaxJoin;
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri), case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end, rtrim(a.ma_lo), b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, b.gia_ton, a.gia_ban_nt, a.gia_nt2, a.ck_nt, rtrim(b.tk_dt), case when exists(select 1 from dmtk z where z.tk = b.tk_dt and z.loai_tk = 1) then 1 else 0 end, rtrim(b.tk_ck), case when exists(select 1 from dmtk z where z.tk = b.tk_ck and z.loai_tk = 1) then 1 else 0 end, case when exists(select ma_kho from dmkho z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho and z.dai_ly_yn = 1) then b.tk_dl else b.tk_vt end, rtrim(b.tk_gv), case when exists(select 1 from dmtk z where z.tk = b.tk_gv and z.loai_tk = 1) then 1 else 0 end, rtrim(a.ma_vt), rtrim(a.ma_kho), 0, rtrim(a.dvt), a.ngay_ct, rtrim(isnull(a.stt_rec_dh, '''')), rtrim(isnull(a.stt_rec0dh, '''')), rtrim(isnull(a.dh_so, '''')), isnull(a.dh_ln, 0) &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; &DetailTaxFieldsBaseRef; &EnvironmentTaxFields; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d66$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt &DetailTaxJoin; &EnvironmentTaxJoin; '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
&EnvironmentTaxQuery; &FlowMultiUpdateCurrentStock; update #d set ton13 = ton13 / case when he_so <> 0 then he_so else 1 end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
